name: 類別資料分析
description: 本課程旨在介紹類別資料的基本概念及分析方法。類別資料在醫學上相當常見，本課程將討論不同的分析方法，在醫學或流行病學中的應用與解釋。
goals: 增進類別資料分析基本概念的理解
提升研究問題與分析資料的能力
了解類別資料分析在相關領域的應用
syllabus:
第一週: Introduction to analysis of categorical data: scale of measurement, sampling frameworks, analysis strategies, contingency tables

第二週: Introduction to analysis of categorical data: scale of measurement, sampling frameworks, analysis strategies, contingency tables

第三週: The 2×2 table: hypothesis testing, exact methods, difference in proportions, measures of association, sensitivity and specificity, McNemar’s test for matched pair data

第四週: The 2×2 table: hypothesis testing, exact methods, difference in proportions, measures of association, sensitivity and specificity, McNemar’s test for matched pair data

第五週: Logistic regression I: dichotomous response; dichotomous, nominal, continuous and ordinal explanatory variables; model fitting; goodness of fit; testing hypotheses; maximum likelihood estimation

第六週: Logistic regression I: dichotomous response; dichotomous, nominal, continuous and ordinal explanatory variables; model fitting; goodness of fit; testing hypotheses; maximum likelihood estimation

第七週: Logistic regression I: dichotomous response; dichotomous, nominal, continuous and ordinal explanatory variables; model fitting; goodness of fit; testing hypotheses; maximum likelihood estimation

第八週: 期中考

第九週: Sets of 2×2 tables: Mantel-Haenszel test, measures of association

第十週: Logistic regression II: polytomous response, proportional odds model, generalized logits model, model fitting

第十一週: Sets of 2×r and s×2 tables: comparing two groups with ordered columns, comparing ordered groups with dichotomous response

第十二週: Poisson regression

第十三週: Generalized Estimating Equations (GEE)

第十四週: The s×r table: tests for association, measures of association, exact test, observer agreement

第十五週: Individual Oral Presentation

第十六週: Group Oral Presentation

第十七週: Additional Paper Assignment and Discussion

第十八週: Additional Paper Assignment and Discussion

methodologies.note: 講述類別資料分析研究的重要概念與分析方法
討論類別資料的解題及相關議題，分為全班討論與小組討論
透過教師引導，完成並報告資料分析的研究結果

grading.note: 個人平時作業: 主要為課程相關的資料分析
命題形式包括資料分析與解釋結果
小組依據分配的資料進行分析，內容包括資料背景、研究設計、分析方法及結論。須於期末在課堂發表，並接受同儕評論。
個人依據分配的論文進行閱讀與分析，須於期末在課堂發表，並接受同儕評論。
